description: Keep all forcings the same as ScenarioMIP SSP3-7 (deforestation scenario), but replace land use with SSP1-2.6 (aforestation) scenario.  Concentration driven.
keywords: LUMIP, Tier 1, Scenario, SSP3-7.0 forcing and SSP1-2.6 land use
rationale: Land-use policy sensitivity simulation for the high radiative forcing scenario.

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the end of the 21st century.
requirements.label: 2015-2100 86yrs

requirements.description: Impose changing RCP2.6 land use including crops, pasture, urban area, vegetation and forest.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 2.6, future, 21st century, SSP1, RCP2.6, Land Use
requirements.label: RCP26LandUse

requirements.description: Impose RCP7.0 forcing excluding land use. Concentration driven.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0, excluding land use
requirements.label: RCP70ForcingExcludingLandUse

requirements.description: An ensemble of at least one simulation
requirements.keywords: minimum 1, at least 1, ensemble, run, simulation
requirements.label: MinimumOne

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model or an Earth System Model
requirements.keywords: AOGCM, ESM, Atmosphere-Ocean, Earth System, Model, Configuration
requirements.label: AOGCM/ESM Configuration
